answers.answer: Have you had a Glucose Intolerance Test done?If not, I would suggest you do as one of the symtpoms of Diabetes is cystic pimples when levels are high.This may not be so in your case but worth thinking about getting tested.

question: Does anyone get small cystic pimples all over body? What causes it and is there anything I can do about it?
title: acne!
